pageContext.claim: “Still can’t believe that Bloomberg violated a firm OFF THE RECORD statement. Will they put out an apology?”
pageContext.analysis: Bloomberg News said it honored its agreement with Trump to keep his comments off the record and there's no evidence they disseminated these comments to others. Neither did Bloomberg publish a story with Trump's off-the-record comments. Daniel Dale, a reporter for the Toronto Star, obtained Trump's off-the-record statements about Canada from this Bloomberg interview and published them. Dale said he did not get Trump's off-the-record comments from Bloomberg.
